title: Sacrifices for Sri Lanka’s CHOGM
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – Those who sold the idea to host CHOGM in Sri Lanka marketing the virtues of holding chairmanship of the Commonwealth, its values, the prestige, the pomp and pageantry, the arrival of VVIPs and other dignitaries forgot or ignored one important fact.
